data.meanings: To dream, have a vision, attain to puberty.
data.sentence: The word لَحَلِيمٌ comes from the root ح ل م and is associated with the meanings: To dream, have a vision, attain to puberty.

data.meanings: compassionate person, one who shows pity by frequently sighing, one who sighs and cries.
data.sentence: The word أَوَّاهٌ comes from the root ا و ه and is associated with the meanings: compassionate person, one who shows pity by frequently sighing, one who sighs and cries.

data.meanings: to supply the place of another. anaaba - to repent and turn again and again and consecutively (to God) with sincere deeds.
data.sentence: The word مُنِيبٌ comes from the root ن و ب and is associated with the meanings: to supply the place of another. anaaba - to repent and turn again and again and consecutively (to God) with sincere deeds.
